reason_health:
oooodiv class='dy-title'ccccPHYSICAL HEALTHoooo/divcccc
            oooodiv class='dy-blurb-cont'cccc
                oooodiv class='dy-content dy-ex' pg='c_health'cccc
                    oooodiv dy='dy-section-title-cont'cccc
                        oooodiv class='dy-section-title'ccccHEALTH IMPACT OF ANIMAL PRODUCTSooooi class='fas fa-minus dy-icon'ccccoooo/iccccoooo/divcccc
                    oooo/divcccc
                    oooodiv class='dy-text'cccc
                        Meat and other animal products tend to be high in saturated fats and dietary cholesterol which can contribute to oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'cccchigher rates of obesity 
                            and a higher risk of heart disease. oooospancccc(1)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc In addition, meat and animal products often contain oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'ccccantibiotics oooospancccc(15)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc, oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'cccccarcinogens oooospancccc(16)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc, 
                                and oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'ccccadded hormones oooospancccc(2)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc. Meat heavy diets are associated with a oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'ccccsignificantly higher level of risk of developing cancer oooospancccc(3)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc. Diets heavy in animal products 
                        have also been linked to chronic lower respiratory disease, diabetes, stroke and cerebrovascular disease, and kidney disease.
                    oooo/divcccc
                oooo/divcccc
                oooodiv class='dy-content dy-cl' pg='c_health'cccc
                    oooodiv dy='dy-section-title-cont'cccc
                        oooodiv class='dy-section-title'ccccHEALTH IMPACT OF PLANTSooooi class='fas fa-plus dy-icon'ccccoooo/iccccoooo/divcccc
                    oooo/divcccc
                    oooodiv class='dy-text'cccc
                        Plant heavy diets naturally tend to have healthier macro ratios (fats/ carbs/ protein). Plants are high in fiber which
                        oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'ccccimproves digestive health oooospancccc(6)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc, and also contain oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'ccccseveral other important vitamins and minerals oooospancccc(5)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc. Vegan and vegetarian diets have been shown to support a oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'cccchealthier gut microbiome oooospancccc(7)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc which has far reaching health effects. The low calorie density of many plant-centric meals
                        helps with oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'cccclosing excess weight. oooospancccc(8)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc Poorly planned vegan diets may provide insufficient amounts of essential fatty acids, vitamin B12, iron, calcium, iodine or zinc 
                    oooo/divcccc
                oooo/divcccc
                oooodiv class='dy-content dy-cl' pg='c_health'cccc
                    oooodiv dy='dy-section-title-cont'cccc
                        oooodiv class='dy-section-title'ccccNOTICEABLE PHYSICAL BENEFITSooooi class='fas fa-plus dy-icon'ccccoooo/iccccoooo/divcccc
                    oooo/divcccc
                    oooodiv class='dy-text'cccc
                        Some of the more noticeable phsical benefits of a vegan diet include oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'ccccclearer skin oooospancccc(12)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc, oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'ccccreduced bad breath and less body odor oooospancccc(11)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc, 
                        better digestive health, and oooospan class='dy-modal-link dy-modal'ccccimproved sexual health oooospancccc(14)oooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc. While there is anecdotal evidence for everything from whiter teeth and strong nails to increased energy, significant studies
                        have not been done. It is likely many of these benefits have more do with overall improvements in diet that come along with a vegan diet like less processed foods and sugar than the absence of animal products.
                            
                    oooo/divcccc
                oooo/divcccc
                oooodiv pg='c_health' class='dy-content dy-fact-cont dy-cl'cccc
                    oooodiv class='dy-fact-title'ccccQUICK FACTSooooi class='fas fa-plus dy-icon dy-icon-fact'ccccoooo/iccccoooo/divcccc
                    oooodiv class='dy-fact-body'ccccooooi class='fas fa-heart dy-fact-icon'ccccoooo/iccccVegans naturally have better breath and less body odoroooo/divcccc
                    oooodiv class='dy-fact-body'ccccooooi class='fas fa-walking dy-fact-icon'ccccoooo/iccccA vegan diet reduces the risk of heart disease by 40%oooo/divcccc
                    oooodiv class='dy-fact-body'ccccooooi class='fas fa-utensils dy-fact-icon'ccccoooo/iccccA vegan diet reduces the risk of developing cancer by 15%oooo/divcccc
                oooo/divcccc
                oooodiv class='dy-qoute'cccc
                    oooodiv class='dy-qoute-title'ccccQOUTEoooo/divcccc
                    oooospan class='dy-qoute-text'cccc'Quite simply, the more you substitute plant foods for animal foods, the healthier you are likely to be.'
                    oooobrccccoooospan class='dy-qoute-name'ccccT. Colin Campbell, PhD, nutritional biochemist, Cornelloooo/spanccccoooo/spancccc
                oooo/divcccc
            oooo/divcccc    
            oooodiv class='dy-infograph'cccc
                oooodiv class='dy-img-cont' cccc
                    ooooimg class='dy-img' src='./../media/images/tcc-png.png'cccc
                    oooodiv class='dy-circle'ccccoooo/divcccc
                oooo/divcccc
            oooo/divcccc
